r.s: Driver based class to calculate holidays.
r.d: Date_Holidays helps you calculate the dates and titles of holidays and other special celebrations. The calculation is driver-based so it is easy to add new drivers that calculate a country's holidays. The methods of the class can be used to get a holiday's date and title in various languages.
r.n: * Fix Bug #12979: some incorrect Icelandic names of holidays [kguest] * Fix Bug #13012: move helper methods from Ireland driver to base class [kguest] * Fix Bug #13395: isHoliday resets interal year storage [kguest] * Fix Bug #13429: Small correction to Danish holidays [kguest] * Implement Feature #12937: Driver for holidays in the Ukraine requested [kguest] * Implement Feature #12938: Driver for holidays in Romania requested [kguest] * Implement Feature #12978: Driver for Iceland requested [kguest]
